name: Divi Advanced Custom Types
author: Pablo Capello

sections.description:
This plugin adds a new Divi Module ready to create post grids from any post types. Select post type, taxonomy, order and more, all from Divi Builder and generate grids for your blog post, team members, movies, product, courses or any other post type with just a few clicks.

You can stylize your grid directly using Divi design options.

Features

  • Simple & Intuitive
  • Divi builder support
  • Custom post type
  • Order
  • Posts limit
  • Post offset

Links

  • Website

PRO

Coming soon with advanced queries, post grid layout and more
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “Advanced Custom Types for Divi”
  3. Activate Advanced Custom Types for Divi from your Plugins page
  4. Go to Divi Builder and select ACT Post Grid module.
  5. Select post type, layout and customize your first post grid.
sections.faq:
Is it necessary to have activated Divi on my site?

Yes! This is a add-on for Divi.

Works with Divi theme and Divi plugin?

Yes! It works with both.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

Release Date – 22 Julio 2019

Features

  • New fullwidth layout
  • More designs options
  • Improve reactivity on VB

Fixes

  • Temporally fix to Divi v3.26 (Reported issue with computed fields) View more about this Divi issue
  • Fixes button design options

1.0.0

Release Date – 23 Junio 2019
